name: Stripe Gallery
description:
Horizontal scrolling gallery for any number of images
Note: List editing currently not supported, so this template doesn't exactly work properly.
author: Kayla

name: Simple Profile Background
description: A simple, easily configurable, auto-updating background image for your profile
author: Kayla

name: Pagedolls
description: Ever wanted a lil picture of you standing on the browser? Here's how to do it!
author: Kayla

name: Wikia template
description: Do you have what feels like an entire wiki worth of info? Well, here's a wiki template for you! (or at least the right side...)
author: degenerate bird

name: Basic gallery
description: Have a lot of images of your char? Care more of function over form? Well, then this dropdown gallery is for you!
author: degenerate bird

name: Grid gallery
description: Have a few same-size character images you want to display in a uniform grid? Then this gallery is made for you.
author: Spierce

name: Simple character card
description: Do you want something to represent an individual? Useful for hubs and the like.
author: Spierce

name: Detailed character card
description: Do you want something to represent an individual? Useful for relationship representation and the like.
author: Mony

name: Roleplay samples
description: Want to show off your writing chops to people? Use this nested dropdown
author: Spierce

name: Zine ad template
description: Is your character a callback to the 80s-00s and a consumer product that would have been advertised in tech zines? Then this profile layout is for you!
author: degenerate bird

name: Cinema profile layout
description: As opposed to most snippets here, this is almost a full profile for you to use!
author: Spierce

name: Fullbody sidebar profile layout
description: As opposed to most snippets here, this is almost a full profile for you to use!
author: Spierce

name: Comic Sans layout
description: If you have a cutesy muffin you want to ERP getting brutally slamfucked - this might be your best bet
author: Spierce
